title: Roast leg of lamb with orange and white wine
ingredients: ['125ml orange juice', '250ml white wine', '60ml olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 (3kg) bone-in leg of lamb, trimmed', 'salt and black pepper']
